modules.name: Quatherina's Quality Quad Quantizer
modules.description:
Quatherina the Quantum Duck's Quantizer with custom & external scales, 16 scenes, offset, sample and hold,
transposition, lead sheet chords parsing, 4 polyphonic quantizer columns, and a licensed illustration of Quatherina

modules.description: Quatherina the Quantum Duck's smaller quantizer

modules.name: Quatherina's Q<
modules.description: Quatherina the Quantum Duck's tiny quantizer - external or expander input only

modules.name: Signature Series Darius
modules.description: Branching 8-step sequencer taking a random path through its nodes

modules.name: Signature Series Lesser Module of Solomon
Signature Series Undular
modules.description:
Scroll the rack via CV for live performance. After initialization, waits 10 seconds before processing signals.
If locked out by mistake, save your patch and reload it, you will have 10 seconds to unplug UnDuLaR
